text: She is one of the thousands who lost their home in the California wildfires last month. And April Love Geary referenced the loss as she posed for an Instagram selfie on Thursday, lamenting that her swimwear collection had been destroyed in the blaze. The 24 - year - old model - who is expecting her second child with Robin Thicke, 41 - posed in a two - piece as she revealed she's been stocking up on new bikinis.
